value.0: Oh! *stops pacing about, and looks at you warily* ...what do ye want?

Stressed? Stressed?! Ah am stressed, ye git! Am waitin' on ae very important lett'r, from tha'.. USELESS boy up at th' Caer.

*stops for just a moment, looking you up and down* Ye.. if ye be goin anytime t' the barracks up a' the Caer, ye tell bloody ELSWORTH, tha' Doris be waitin' fer his lett'r an 'e best not keep me waitin' overlong, or it'll be too late tae stop nature's course! Go on! Git' on wit ye! Barracks be right next t' the hall o' the Caer itself.
Aye? Where is it, then?
Dragon?! Ye eejit, thes only gulls 'll snatch a paper from yer 'and round these parts! Get away with ye!
Ye're a bastid then in't ya? Git outta here, before ah shout fer me da!
Oh aye? *eyes you suspiciously* an' what did ye do with tha' letter?

*sniffs and glares at you* Fine. At least ye didn't steal the coin too eh? 

I guess that good-fer-nuthin' Elsworth is good fer somethin' after all. Tell 'im... thanks. An tell 'im... *hefts the coins you gave her* this'll be enough. *she hurries off*
Ye do? *looking very relieved* Thank th' Mother. Please, may I see it?
*she takes the envelope and looks at it* Eh... this'ns been opened! Why ye been readin' private writins' that don' concern ye?
*she opens the envelope and takes out the letter* Wha'... this's been opened... an' this hasnae any coin with it! Where's the coin Elsworth promised me tae help with me with.. with ma problem??

*takes the coin and eyes you suspiciously* right... well, ah guess the good-fer-nuthin' is nae such a good-fer-nuthin' after all.

Tell him thank ye. And tell him... tha' this will be enough. *she hurries off down the street*
Ye do? *sincerely, looking relieved* Thank the Mother. Please, may I see it?
Please, I... I beg of ye... ye don't understand, I /need/ that letter. I don't have any coin tae give!

*opens the envelope and reads the letter* Aye, this is his.. uh.. par-ticular hand. *looks at some coins in the envelope*. Well, ah guess the good-fer-nuthin' is nae such a good-fer-nuthin' after all.

Tell him thank ye. And tell him... tha' this will be enough. *she hurries off down the street*
Um, are you all right? You look very... stressed.
What an eccentric performance.
Uh... Doris? I was given a letter for you, from Elsworth.
A really big dragon swooped down and snatched it out of my hand!
I threw it away
I don't have the letter anymore, but I'd like to give you the coin he wanted you to have <StartCheck>*GIVE HER the 20 gold you took from the envelope*</Start>
You have your coin all right? I'm going
Are you Doris? I have a letter for you, from Elsworth
All right *hand over the letter*
Look, you got your letter, all right?
All right *hand over the letter*
Oh, uh... here's your coin *give her the 20 gold you took from the envelope*
[ALIGNMENT RESTORED]
Not my problem.
Nothing, nothing at all.
Are you Doris? I have a letter for you, from Elsworth
Hmm... what's it worth to you?
No coin for me, no letter for you! *leave without giving her the letter*
All right *hand over the letter*
